Rafael Lopes Duarte Barros

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3174688231509773
  • Última atualização do currículo em 03/10/2018

Atualmente é Diretor Industrial na Yenzah Cosméticos. Tem experiência na área de Engenharia Química e Produção Industrial, com ênfase Mapeamento, Otimização e Controle de Processos, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: Controle Avançado Multivariável, Otimização em Tempo Real, Manufacturing Execution Systems e todos os softwares ligados à otimização de processos para todas as indústrias de processamento químico (Química, Petroquímica, Papel e Celulose, Metais e Mineração). (Texto informado pelo autor)

Rockwell Automation, ROCKWELL, Brasil.
Vínculo institucional

2011 - 2014
Vínculo: Celetista formal, Enquadramento Funcional: Consultor Técnico para América Latina, Carga horária: 44, Regime: Dedicação exclusiva.
Outras informações
A division of Rockwell Automation, Inc., Pavilion Technologies? model-based software drives profitability for leading manufacturers like Braskem, Klabin, Cemex, Bridgestone, NOVA Chemicals, Nestlé, SABIC Europe and TOTAL Petrochemicals. Pavilion?s solutions facilitate quick response to market demands, continuous reduction of costs, consistent achievement of quality targets, and enhanced air quality. Pavilion's solutions are used every day by more than 350 of the most performance-driven manufacturing companies in the world. My Main Activities are: - Responsible for Pavillion Technologies business growth in Latin America, together with Brazil team, either implementing market-leading Pavillion application and developing new cutting-edge solutions for other industries; - Conduction of process audits on client unit operations; - Generation of project baseline and benefit expectation studies; - Involvement in services estimates on projects; - Advise on functional design of applications; - Contribution to insure proper implementation and functioning of solutions to client specification; - Identify and/or assist in developing new solutions that provide value to customers; - Support front line sales meetings with Sales Account Managers.


HONEYWELL DO BRASIL LTDA, HNL - BR, Brasil.
Vínculo institucional

2007 - 2011
Vínculo: Celetista formal, Enquadramento Funcional: Manager, Carga horária: 44, Regime: Dedicação exclusiva.
Outras informações
- Responsible for the Center of Excellence (COE) growth in Brazil, structuring and managing the local team, rather than look for new hirings. - Responsible to provide to the COE Brazil Engineers the conditions to perform their work in an efficient way (managing project alocations, making performance reviews, structuring training and development programs) - Responsible for ensuring the successful implementation of APC, OTS and MES solutions for all metals and mining, aromatics, olefins projects, pulp and paper, food and beverage and pharmaceutical production processes. Also contributed to the development of best practices and provided input into product development and strategy. - Working as APC, OTS or MES application engineer on those projects. - Benefits Assessment Studies for all of those industries.
